mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, password, name, email, contact, address, zipcode) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{contact}, #{address}, #{zipCode})
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, password, name, email, contact, address, zipcode, regdate, enabled, a.auth FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN member_auth a ON m.id = a.id WHERE m.id = #{id}
